title: Peripheral blood mononuclear cells (PBMCs) from a healthy donor
summary: The RNA sequence of 8,403 peripheral blood mononuclear cells (PBMCs) from a healthy donor.  This is a demonstration set created using of the 10x Genomics Chromium platform with v2 Chemistry processed by Cell Ranger 1.3.0. The library was sequenced to a depth of approximatedly 92,000 reads per cell.
